original_title: Justin Bieber: A Star is Born
overview: Music - Justin Beiber was born to make music! Before he was 15 he taught himself to play the piano, drums, guitar, and trumpet. This documentary chronicles his life, and documents his transition from a street performer to a mega teen superstar. Everyday a child is born but on March 1st, 1994, "A Star Was Born." -  Justin Bieber
title: Justin Bieber: A Star is Born
